name: 💎 MENKO STORM CRYSTAL
description:
THIS UNIQUE CRYSTAL CONTAINS THE SPIRIT OF THE STORM CLAN, AND CAN BE USED TO SUMMON MORE SAMURAI. 

STORM CRYSTALS CAN ONLY BE USED BY  THE STORM CLAN LEADER (MUST HOLD UNLISTED CLAN MASK & CLAN LEADER AIRDROP NFT) AND CAN ONLY BE PURCHASED VIA OBJKT.COM OFFER  - COST: 19 

USING A CRYSTAL WILL SUMMON 5 SAMURAI OF THE SAME CLAN. 1 SPECIAL EDITION SAMURAI WILL BE ISSUED TO THE CLAN LEADER & THE REMAINING 4 WILL BE LISTED WITHIN 1 HOUR OF THE AIRDROP AT A COST OF 5 EACH.
SPREAD THE WORD AND ALLOW YOUR ALLIES TO CLAIM THEM, OR COLLECT THEM ALL FOR YOURSELF AND BUILD YOUR ARMY; THE CHOICE IS YOURS.

PURCHASE RULES - 
- OWN UNLISTED CLAN LEADER MASK
- OWN UNLISTED CLAN LEADER SAMURAI 
- MAKE OFFER OF 19 ON OBJKT.COM

SUMMON RULES -
- SEND 1 CRYSTAL TO BURN.MENKO.TEZ OR
tz1V2ziyEQVE2v1U4v8qJCX8E7MXMzUx8qfX

*CRYSTALS ARE RENDERED INEFFECTIVE IF NOT USED BY CLAN LEADERS AND THEREFORE CANNOT BE TRADED. A CRYSTAL CANNOT BE PURCHASED BY THE LEADER OF A DIFFERENT CLAN.
ONCE A CRYSTAL IS USED IT WILL BE BURNED AND ANOTHER CRYSTAL WILL ONLY BECOME AVAILABLE WHEN ALL OF THE SAMURAI HAVE BEEN CLAIMED.

GOOD LUCK 

👺
